title: Forever101
author: Forever101
content: My country people, joy hit my chest today ooo, I no no maybe e  reach urside, MTN wipe my debt and everybody for our area oo, dis one don throw joy for everybody face. Imagine the debt wey you know no how u go take pay, all of a sudden Dem wipe am commot. Dis one sweet my belle. MTN una don reduce worry and overthinking for this economic crisis. As e be now person go fit buy data take dey do online hustle, stay updated on Bitcoin matter

comments.author: Egii Nna
comments.body: If you are online in social media, you would have seen that MTN has announced that it was a glitch in the system, and all customers that have seen their debt not reflecting will reflect it after they have resolved the technical problem, so in this case, I see no reason to be happy because you will still pay that money back.
